title: How to Make a Pinwheel Platter (for Toddlers)

steps.headline: Place the meat slices on a plate.
Layer the cheese slices on the meat.
Roll the meat and cheese into a tube.
Cut the tube into small and appropriate portions for your toddler.
Poke a toothpick through the fruit/vegetable, cheese, and meat.
Serve and watch your toddler smile.

text: Place the meat slices on a plate.  Layer the cheese slices on the meat.  Roll the meat and cheese into a tube.  Cut the tube into small and appropriate portions for your toddler.  Poke a toothpick through the fruit/vegetable, cheese, and meat.  Serve and watch your toddler smile.
